attributes.comment:
The process of adopting international is already a costly experience. I wouldn't
mind increasing fees, if it was to hire more people to help expedite the process of
being able to bring your child home faster, or to make a love one a US Citizen a
little less stressful. My husband and I have been in the process of adopting for 16
months and have paid our fee for the I-600A and do not feel it is fair for us to have
to pay more money because the adoption process has taken longer than
necessary. Raising fees to this degree, will only make it harder for families to
complete the necessary paper work for their love ones. Please reconsider.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
